MINIO_ADDRESS: Binds the minio server process to a specific network address and port number.
MINIO_CONSOLE_ADDRESS: Specifies a static port for the embedded MinIO Console.
MINIO_CERTS_DIR: Specifies the path to the folder containing certificates the minio process uses for configuring TLS/SSL connectivity.
MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: Root user password. Defaults to minioadmin
MINIO_SITE_REGION: name of the location of the server e.g. "us-west-1"
MINIO_SITE_COMMENT: optionally add a comment to this setting
MINIO_STORAGE_CLASS_STANDARD: set the parity count for default standard storage class e.g. "EC:4"
MINIO_STORAGE_CLASS_RRS: set the parity count for reduced redundancy storage class e.g. "EC:2"
MINIO_STORAGE_CLASS_COMMENT: optionally add a comment to this setting
MINIO_ETCD_ENDPOINTS: comma separated list of etcd endpoints e.g. "http://localhost:2379"
MINIO_ETCD_PATH_PREFIX: namespace prefix to isolate tenants e.g. "customer1/"
MINIO_ETCD_COREDNS_PATH: shared bucket DNS records, default is "/skydns"
MINIO_ETCD_CLIENT_CERT_KEY: client cert key for mTLS authentication
MINIO_ETCD_COMMENT: optionally add a comment to this setting
MINIO_API_REQUESTS_MAX: set the maximum number of concurrent requests (default: 'auto')
MINIO_API_CLUSTER_DEADLINE: set the deadline for cluster readiness check (default: '10s')
MINIO_API_CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN: set comma separated list of origins allowed for CORS requests (default: '*')
MINIO_API_REMOTE_TRANSPORT_DEADLINE: set the deadline for API requests on remote transports while proxying between federated instances e.g. "2h" (default: '2h')
MINIO_API_LIST_QUORUM: set the acceptable quorum expected for list operations e.g. "optimal", "reduced", "disk", "strict", "auto" (default: 'strict')
MINIO_API_REPLICATION_MAX_WORKERS: set the maximum number of replication workers (default: '500')
MINIO_API_TRANSITION_WORKERS: set the number of transition workers (default: '100')
MINIO_API_STALE_UPLOADS_EXPIRY: set to expire stale multipart uploads older than this values (default: '24h')
MINIO_API_STALE_UPLOADS_CLEANUP_INTERVAL: set to change intervals when stale multipart uploads are expired (default: '6h')
MINIO_API_DELETE_CLEANUP_INTERVAL: set to change intervals when deleted objects are permanently deleted from ".trash" folder (default: '5m')
MINIO_API_ODIRECT: set to enable or disable O_DIRECT for writes under special conditions. NOTE: do not disable O_DIRECT without prior testing (default: 'on')
MINIO_API_ROOT_ACCESS: turn 'off' root credential access for all API calls including s3, admin operations (default: 'on')
MINIO_API_SYNC_EVENTS: set to enable synchronous bucket notifications (default: 'off')
MINIO_API_OBJECT_MAX_VERSIONS: set max allowed number of versions per object (default: '9223372036854775807')
MINIO_BROWSER: Enable or disable access to console web UI. By default it is set to 'on'
MINIO_DOMAIN: enable virtual-host-style requests e.g. "mydomain.com" or multiple domains with comma separated values e.g. "sub1.mydomain.com,sub2.mydomain.com"
